subject: Montel's show.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Hi all;

Wednesdays Montel Williams has Sylvia Brown on, today they also had a woman 
who got one of those phone messages for a dead relative. So....... I left a 
note on the "opinion" page, where veiwers can leave feedback about shows. I 
couldn't find a regular e-mail contact on the show site, I used the opinion 
page to tell about my boxes. So far, very few have taken my work seriously, 
if at all, as if they "know better", so I'm not expecting any follow up, but 
ya never know.


Frank
